medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: After the Bath
marks: [昭和五年夏] {Sho_wa gonen natsu} [深水畫] {Shinsui ga}
description: portrait (bijin-ga); crouching woman wearing blue and white kimono, holding her PL sleeve in her mouth; wringing a rust-colored and white cloth
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
